data.actual_result: You can talk freely using Voice Activation when you shouldn't.
data.expected_result: You get muted and a warning pops up saying that you can't talk until you enable PTT (or it force switches you to PTT mode)
data.short_description: Users are not forced to use Push-to-Talk
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a channel that has the "Use Voice Activity" permission denied - Talk
